00023 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00024 #include "util/TmpFileFactory.h"
00025 #include "util/Util.h"

00031 #include <fstream>
00032 #include <string>

00034 
00036 
00037 int opt_debug=0;
00038 int opt_verbose=0;
00039 
00041 
00044 void
00045 test_write_data(const std::string& filename)
00046 {
00047   assert(!Util::fileReadable(filename));
00048 
00049   std::ofstream outs;
00050   outs.open(filename.c_str());
00051   outs<<filename<<std::endl;
00052   outs.close();
00053 }
00054 
00056 
00057 void
00058 test_1()
00059 {
00060   // make a new factory to generate temp files.
00061   TmpFileFactory* tff=new TmpFileFactory();
00062   std::string tfn;
00063   tff->setPrefix("tff-test1-");
00064   tff->setDebug(opt_debug);
00065   tff->setVerbose(opt_verbose);
00066   //
00067   for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
00068     // this allocates a tmp file name and remembers it.
00069     tfn=tff->genFilename();
00070     if (opt_verbose>0) {
00071       printf("%4d : '%s'\n",i,tfn.c_str());
00072     }
00073     // put something in the file.
00074     test_write_data(tfn);
00075   }
00076   // When the object is deleted, it cleans up all the tmpfiles.
00077   delete tff;
00078 }
00079 
00082 void
00083 test_2_helper(TmpFileFactory* tff,int cnt)
00084 {
00085   for (int i=0;i<cnt;i++) {
00086     printf("%4d : '%s'\n",i,tff->genFilename().c_str());
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void
00091 test_2()
00092 {
00093   TmpFileFactory* tff=new TmpFileFactory();
00094   tff->setPrefix("tff-test2-");
00095   tff->setDebug(opt_debug);
00096   tff->setVerbose(opt_verbose);
00097   // passing the context into a fuctions
00098   test_2_helper(tff,5);
00099   test_2_helper(tff,5);
00100   // now clean up.
00101   delete tff;
00102 }
00103 
00104 void
00105 test_3()
00106 {
00107   TmpFileFactory* tff=new TmpFileFactory();
00108   tff->setPrefix("tff-test3-");
00109   tff->setDebug(opt_debug);
00110   tff->setVerbose(opt_verbose);
00111   //
00112   for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
00113     tff->genDirname();
00114   }
00115   // make a subdir and allocate future tmp files in that subdir.
00116   tff->setTmpdir(tff->genDirname());
00117   //
00118   test_2_helper(tff,5);
00119   test_2_helper(tff,5);
00120   //
00121   delete tff;
00122 }
00123 
00124 void
00125 test_4()
00126 {
00127   // generate 10 dirs for fun.
00128   for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
00129     GlobalTmpFileFactory()->genDirname();
00130   }
00131   // set the dir to /var/tmp on unix. (Where on windows?)
00132   GlobalTmpFileFactory()->setTmpdir(GlobalTmpFileFactory()->getSystemTmpDir());
00133   // gen a subdir in that directory and set our tmp dir to dir we made.
00134   GlobalTmpFileFactory()->setTmpdir(GlobalTmpFileFactory()->genDirname());
00135 
00136   // generate 10 filenames in the new tmp dir for fun.
00137   for (int i=0;i<10;i++) {
00138     test_write_data(GlobalTmpFileFactory()->genFilename());
00139   }
00140 }

00144 int
00145 main(int argc,char* argv[])
00146 {
00147   PgOptions* opts=new PgOptions();
00148   //
00149   opts->setUsage("Example and test program for generating test filenames."
00150                  "\n"
00151                  );
00152   //
00153   opts->defineOption("h","help", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00154                      "Show help for the program.",
00155                      "false");
00156   opts->defineOption("v","verbose",PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00157                      "verbose level",
00158                      "0");
00159   opts->defineOption("d","debug",PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00160                      "debugging level.\n"
00161                      "0 => None.\n"
00162                      "1 => Print the tmp filename as they are generated.\n"
00163                      "2 => Dont remove tmp files, leave them there for analysis.\n",
00164                      "0");
00165   //
00166   opts->parseArgv(argv);
00167   //
00168   opt_debug  =opts->getInt("debug");
00169   opt_verbose=opts->getInt("verbose");
00170 
00171   // set some options.  (this is optional.)
00172   GlobalTmpFileFactory()->setPrefix("tff-global-");
00173   GlobalTmpFileFactory()->setDebug(opt_debug);
00174   GlobalTmpFileFactory()->setVerbose(opt_verbose);
00175 
00176   //
00177   test_1();
00178   test_2();
00179   test_3();
00180   test_4();
00181 
00182   // need to clean up when exiting.
00183   GlobalTmpFileFactoryFree();
00184   //
00185   printf("ok.\n");
00186 }
